metadata.title: CVE-2024-46954 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
[Fix decode_utf8 to forbid overlong encodings]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46954` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 10.03.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1
libgs-common - 10.03.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1
libgs10 - 10.03.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1
libgs10-common - 10.03.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.03.1~dfsg1-0ubuntu2.1').
